Reviews.Title: T4i is good by me
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied.  Easy to use, even for rookies, and capable of being used in many ways that I'm just learning about.Products were well packaged, albeit individually.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: catherine gamarra
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera for my kids Lacrosse games. I purchased the T4i and Ive been real happy with the pictures I've taken with it.

Reviews.Title: Best Investment Ever!
Reviews.Author: Juanita Coleman "Nita"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my fiancé as a Christmas gift and he loves it.Pros:Touch ScreenCame with many extraseasy to usehas ability to get as advanced or basic as neededCons:bag was limited in space for all the gadgetWe overall love the camera! we take our own professional photos now and love every moment ! ")
